name: Ceferina Banquez
description: '''Ceferina Banquez Teherán'''{{family name footnote|Banquez|Teherán|lang=Spanish}} (1943–2023) was a Colombian singer and songwriter. She began her music career in her 60s, and released three albums featuring songs that she wrote about her experiences of violence and [[forced displacement|displacement]], predominantly in the genre of [[bullerengue]].
